description: Take Piper Trail to Nickerson Ledge.  Its a beautiful, granite mountain with amazing views.  There are steep, exposed ledges.  The whole loop is about 9.8 miles but these trails are about 7 miles.
directions: To Champney Falls Trail (Brook) parking lot, Kankamagus Highway (NH 112):From the east:Kancamagus Highway (NH 112), 11.5 mi. from Rt. 16 in Conway, NHFrom the west:Kancamagus Highway (NH 112), 21.5 mi. from Loon Mtn. entrance in Lincoln, NH
